data.title: Credits – Production Partners, Inc.
data.text:
OUTSIDERS INN • Produced for Renegade 83 • 8 Episodes for CMT Network

Half hour hybrid comedy/reality series starring Maureen McCormick, Carnie Wilson, and Bobby Brown

FAT ACTRESS • 7 episodes for Showtime Networks

Half hour hybrid comedy starring multiple Emmy Award winner, Kirstie Alley

Guest Stars: John Travolta, Kelly Preston, Kevin Nealon, Merv Griffin, Kid Rock, Melissa Gilbert, Leah Rimini

CURB YOUR ENTHUSIASM • Seasons 1 & 2 – 20 episodes for HBO

Half hour hybrid comedy starring Seinfeld co-creator Larry David

Guest Stars: Richard Lewis, Mary Steenburgen, Ted Danson, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Rob, Reiner, Jason Alexander, Wanda Sykes, Rita Wilson, Ed Asner, Shaquille OʼNeal, Sofia,Milos, Nia Vardalos and many more

2002 Emmy Nomination: “Outstanding Comedy Series” • 2001 AFI Award Winner: “Best Comedy Series”

HOWIE MANDELʼS SUNNY SKIES • 13 episodes for Showtime Networks

Half hour sketch comedy series starring comedian Howie Mandel.

CableAce Nomination: “Actor in a Comedy Series” – Howie Mandel

ASK RITA • 75 episodes

Half hour syndicated comedy talk show starring comedian Rita Rudner

Guests: Steve Martin, Dennis Miller, Jeff Foxworthy, Cheryl Hines, Robert Klein, DL Hughley, Betty White, Daisy

Fuentes, Carol Leifer, Louie Anderson, Susan Anton, Jeff Garlin, Heidi Fleiss, Kevin Nealon, Leeza Gibbons,

Howie Mandel and many, many more.

THE LA THING WITH JOHN DOE • 6 episodes for Walt Disney Television

Half hour music/variety show starring singer/songwriter John Doe of the punk band “X”

Guest Stars: Mare Winningham, Janeane Garofalo and Sandra Bernhard

Local Emmy Nomination: “LA Local Color”

MUD SHOW • ABC Family

Half hour hybrid comedy finds a reluctant circus owner who has recently inherited a nearly bankrupt big top from his estranged father, complete with its dysfunctional family of misfits and performers.

NIGHTLIFE • Walt Disney Television

The pilot for the show that became “The LA Thing”

HOLLYWOOD LIVES • Buena Vista Television

One of the first reality shows, Hollywood Lives follows four up and coming young artists finding their way to fame and fortune in Hollywood.

RITAʼS ON NOW • Buena Vista Television

Half hour comedy travelogue from the mind of the hilarious Rita Rudner

CRAIG FERGUSON: DOES THIS NEED TO BE SAID? • EPIX / Comedy Central
